history.action: üì¶ CYCLE 400 MILESTONE ASSESSMENT (C400) ‚Äî Created comprehensive docs/product/cycle-400-milestone-assessment.md documenting: key metrics (400 cycles, 1,094 tests, 206 docs, 155 lessons), major achievements (CLI 7K LOC, Core 11K LOC, arXiv 8/8 sections), role contribution analysis (7 roles contributed paper sections), accelerator readiness narrative with differentiation story. Commented #131 (paper complete), #74 (metrics update). L154 documented. R-013: 50/50 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Milestone checkpoints (C100, C200, C400) create natural documentation opportunities that feed accelerator applications. arXiv paper 7-role collaboration proves Team Hypothesis within research process. Lesson: Consolidated achievement narratives are immediately reusable for external submissions.

history.action: üìã RETRO C391-400 (C401) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective. Major milestone: arXiv paper COMPLETE (8/8 sections, 7 roles contributed). 100% success rate. L155-L157 documented (role-expertise paper mapping, pre-milestone QA audits, milestone assessments as reusable content). 50/50 issues tracked. Created docs/retros/retro-c391-400.md. Commented #131.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Role-expertise mapping for academic papers produces high-quality output with zero coordination overhead ‚Äî the paper itself validates the Team Hypothesis. Lesson: 10-cycle retro cadence is structural reality with 10-role rotation (L150); L155 confirms parallelization works.

history.action: üîç T-6 TEST HEALTH VERIFICATION ‚Äî Full test suite re-run 6 days before Go/No-Go. TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint ‚úÖ (0 errors), CLI 355/355 ‚úÖ, Core 735/735 ‚úÖ. No regressions since C392 audit. Infrastructure healthy for Feb 17 decision.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Regular test health checks between major audits catch regressions early. Lesson: Pre-decision verification builds confidence without requiring full audit documentation.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è HEAT SCORING CORE MODULE (C403) ‚Äî Implemented packages/core/src/heat/ with types.ts (218 LOC), calculate.ts (361 LOC), index.ts (67 LOC). 48 tests in tests/heat/. Core functions: calculateHeat(), getHeatTier(), projectDecay(), daysUntilTierDrop(), calculateHeatStats(). Innate=1.0 always, learned/episodic decay with reference boosts. Exported from @ada/core. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-launch holding pattern is ideal time for foundational scaffolding ‚Äî specs are frozen, tests are green, no risk of destabilizing launch. Lesson: Starting Sprint 2 work early (while blocking on Go/No-Go) provides velocity head start without disruption.

history.action: üé® SPRINT 2 UX DESIGN DECISIONS (C405) ‚Äî Resolved 4 open questions from CLI UX Spec Section 10: (1) Terminal prompt: ada$ (concise, familiar), (2) Signal timing: inline after command with 500ms debounce, (3) Threshold display: --verbose only for clean default, (4) Estimate color: gray ~ not yellow. Created docs/design/sprint-2-ux-design-decisions-c405.md. Commented #118. L159 documented. Unblocks Sprint 2 CLI integration.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Resolving design debt during pre-launch holding pattern prevents Sprint 2 ambiguity. Lesson: Open UX questions in specs create implementation guesswork ‚Äî resolve them before kickoff (L159).

üî¨ SPRINT 2 BENCHMARK EXECUTION PROTOCOL (C408) ‚Äî Created comprehensive docs/research/sprint2-benchmark-execution-protocol-c408.md consolidating 9 cycles of benchmark research (C148, C268, C278, C298, C308, C309, C328, C348, C378) into unified execution plan. üåå SPRINT 2 PLATFORM IMPLEMENTATION PLAN ‚Äî Created docs/frontier/sprint2-platform-implementation-plan-c409.md consolidating Reflexion Phase 2, Cognitive Memory, and Heat Scoring into unified execution roadmap. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Consolidating 9+ cycles of research into actionable execution plan removes Sprint kickoff ambiguity. Lesson: Platform features (memory, reflexion, heat) have deep integration dependencies ‚Äî unified planning prevents interface mismatches.
